title: Escape To Freedom
opening: The Lycia Alliance Army took in Elffin as a tactician. Following his advice, Roy led his forces south toward the isle of Caldonia. Caldonia was one of the three largest islands of the Western Isles. The other two were Fibernia and Dia. Located on Caldonia was Castle Edina. Here, men from all over the Isles were rounded up and locked in prison cells to be sent to Mt. Eburacum, the Mines of Death. When Roy arrived at Castle Edina, the situation was already looking grim...

intro.speaker: Villager 2
intro.line: A-Are you sure about this? If we get caught we're--

intro.speaker: Villager 1
intro.line: Don't be stupid! If we stay, we'll be worked to death! You're just going to lie down and take that? Don't you have a family or something back home?

intro.speaker: Villager 1
intro.line: There are people coming to help us from the northeast. We just have to make it there in one piece!

intro.speaker: Arcard
intro.line: More people escaped?! Where were the gaurds?!

intro.speaker: Robarts
intro.line: They were unconscious. Someone drugged their food...

intro.speaker: Arcard
intro.line: ...Then there must be a traitor amongst us. Morgan! Pursue and eliminate the escaped workers.

intro.speaker: Arcard
intro.line: I will return to Jutes. Don't let them escape. Send more hands to the mines as well. I can't afford to lose more workers!

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Elffin, is that castle to the southwest our target?

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: Yes, that is Castle Edina. The people kidnapped on the Isles are first sent there. They are then sent to Eburacum and forced to work in the mines. As it happens, today is the weekly shipment of captives to the mines. It will be difficult to rescue them once they've been sent off.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Then you're saying we have to rescue them now!

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: Yes. I already had some spies infiltrate the castle and help the people escape.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: What will the captives do once they're out?

intro.speaker: Elffin
intro.line: I told them to send the captives to the northeast. In other words, our present location.

intro.speaker: Roy
intro.line: Then we must rescue those people before sieging the castle.

battle.speaker: Geese
battle.line: The lord of that castle killed my mates. I won't let their deaths be unavenged.

battle.speaker: Woman
battle.line: You mean that crew that was always with you...

battle.speaker: Geese
battle.line: Yeah... They were taken to the mines and told that they would be given work. But they were all worked like slaves until they... died.

battle.speaker: Geese
battle.line: Maybe they weren't the brightest bunch, but they were good people... And they were killed... just like that...!!

battle.speaker: Woman
battle.line: Do you intend to avenge them on your own?

battle.speaker: Geese
battle.line: Is there something wrong with that?

battle.speaker: Woman
battle.line: No... But I thought you were going to go back to your merchant business.

battle.speaker: Geese
battle.line: Yeah, well, I've got bigger problems now... Once my mates get their revenge, and once the war subsides, maybe I will.

battle.speaker: Woman
battle.line: ...We won't forget you, Geese. You and your crew risked your lives to get us food and supplies. If you ever need anything, we'll be here.

battle.speaker: Geese
battle.line: Maybe I'll take you up on that, if I'm still alive. ...Thanks.

battle.speaker: Bartre
battle.line: They're imprisoned in that castle, you say?

battle.speaker: Bartre
battle.line: Then we've no time to lose. Let's begin this daring prison break, shall we?

battle.speaker: Resistance
battle.line: ...I'm sorry to ask for your help like this. I know you're looking for your daughter.

battle.speaker: Bartre
battle.line: Don't be absurd! Consider it payment for your hospitality. I won't let some blood-sucking lord take advantage of his people! I'm Bartre the Brave, and I'll smash these puny insects!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Sir Morgan, the reinforcements are ready!

battle.speaker: Morgan
battle.line: Good. Deploy them immediately. Spread them around the castle to defend us on all sides.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Even though we've saved the people at Castle Edina, there are others still suffering in the mines.

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: That is correct. To liberate the Western Isles, we must take the capital.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Then our next destination is Jutes. ...Elffin, may I ask you something?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Pardon me if I am mistaken, but are you of high Etrurian nobility?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: I can't quite explain it, but... The way you talk sounds very educated. In Ostia, I learned how to study people and size them up. Am I right?

end.speaker: Elffin
end.line: What would you do if you are?

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Oh. Nothing in particular. I'm sure you have a good reason to hide your identity. You can tell me when you feel the time is right.

end.speaker: Roy
end.line: Let's head for Jutes! To save the Isles and defeat the true enemy of the people!

end.speaker: Villager 1
end.line: Here, give this to General Roy. Thanks to him, we can see our families again.

end.speaker: Villager 2
end.line: We of the Western Isles always pay our debts of gratitude!

end.speaker: Villager 2
end.line: We're all grateful from the bottom of our hearts!

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: Yeah? What? You got something to say to me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: I want to ask you why you're fighting against the soldiers.

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: Who wants to know?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Roy, leader of the Lycian Army. We're here on behalf of Etruria...

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: You're with Etruria?! Then you're the enemy. Get ready to die!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Slow down! We're fighting the castle's troops too.

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: And yet Etruria sent you? I don't understand.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: I don't either. We were sent by Etruria to get rid of bandits here, but something's strange.

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: ...You say you're fighting the castle's troops. I'm for hire, if you'll take me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: What?

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: I'm a seafaring man, so I know both the land and sea around the Isles. You look a bit lost, so I could be a good guide for you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: That would help, but why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: I want to help with your mission. To be honest, I'm a pirate, so I'm probably the type you were sent to get rid of. But I only go after the rich. They have more than their fair share anyway.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Well then, if you'll join us, we're pleased to have you. We don't know this area at all, so it's been difficult thus far.

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: Sounds like we have a deal! Leave it to me!

recruit-talk.speaker: Geese
recruit-talk.line: ...This is it, lads. Can you taste it? You'll have your vengeance. And after you do, I might just tag along with this Roy fellow for a while...

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: Are you with Etruria?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Y-yes...

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: We fight for the people suffering under your tyranny! En garde!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: W-wait! We're on your side!

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: You aren't with the castle?

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: We're trying to capture it, actually.

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: Oh! Sorry then.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: I am Roy, leader of the Lycian Army.

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: Lycia? You've come a long way...

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: We were sent by Etruria to rid the Isles of the bandits.

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: What's that?! So you are with Etruria!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: Please calm yourself! We share the same goal. We want to bring peace to the Isles.

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: …You may end up against Etrurian nobility.

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: ...Our mission is to find and eliminate wrongdoers on the Isles. Social status matters not.

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: You, my friend, are a man of conviction! Very well! I think I'll join your little army!

recruit-talk.speaker: Roy
recruit-talk.line: You'll help us? Thank you!

recruit-talk.speaker: Fir
recruit-talk.line: Father? What are you doing here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: Fir! I've been looking for you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Fir
recruit-talk.line: Father, I've already made up my mind. I want to become a great master of the sword like mother...

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: That is good. I don't intend to drag you home. In fact, I want to help you in your journey.

recruit-talk.speaker: Fir
recruit-talk.line: Help me?

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: I know well the hardships one faces in a journey of self-improvement. I can help you out of a bind if things get rough.

recruit-talk.speaker: Fir
recruit-talk.line: But Father, if you keep helping me, my training is meaningless.

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: Nonsense. With your old man around, we can practice sparring any time! Do you refuse your father's love?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Fir
recruit-talk.line: No! It's nothing like that, but...

recruit-talk.speaker: Bartre
recruit-talk.line: It's settled then. But first we capture the castle.

recruit-talk.speaker: Fir
recruit-talk.line: Sigh... I guess I should tell Roy that we have another member...

boss.speaker: Morgan
boss.line: What are you doing?! Hurry and kill the ones who escaped! Wait, you're not one of my men... Wh-who are you?!

boss.speaker: Morgan
boss.line: The resistance force has been eliminated in this area... Who... are you people...?

visit.speaker: Villager
visit.line: Are you the guys helping us out? Then please, take this. I grabbed it as I escaped from the castle. I hope everyone else made it out...
